text: I've always been one that would look down on my grass the soil Health deals I couldn't make much improvement things didn't look healthy the way we were doing things we're doing everything quote unquote right and I knew we had to do something different our rotation it requires something different so we changed our method of grazing and then it just boomed with soil life and health and plant structure and that allowed us to change our whole operation [Music]
